Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh has had an up and down tournament so far, suffering three losses against England, New Zealand, and India.
South Africa began their campaign by racking up a World Cup-record 428/5 against Sri Lanka to secure a 102-run victory, before beating Australia by 134 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match between Bangladesh and South Africa will be played at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai.
The live streaming of the game between Bangladesh and South Africa will be on Disney+ Hotstar.
Others: The ICC ODI World Cup 2023 game between Bangladesh and South Africa is scheduled to start at 14:00 (IST) (+5:30 GMT).
Star Sports Network has acquired the rights to broadcast the ICC ODI World Cup 2023.
